headline: Is American Water Works Company (AWK) Pricing Reflect Its Regulated Utility Stability?
summary: If you are wondering whether American Water Works Company is fairly priced or offering a margin of safety right now, this article will walk you through what the numbers are saying about its valuation. The stock recently closed at US$129.13, with returns of a 0.4% decline over 7 days, a 0.9% decline over 30 days, a 0.9% decline year to date, a 6.1% gain over 1 year, an 11.9% decline over 3 years, and a 14.0% decline over 5 years, which gives you a mixed picture of recent and longer term...
